text: Thrill of a Lifetime is a 1937 American comedy movie directed by George Archainbaud and starring James V. Kern, Charles Adler, George Kelly, Billy Mann, Judy Canova, Ben Blue, Eleanore Whitney. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * Category:1937 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by George Archainbaud
title: Thrill of a Lifetime
